metadata.title: CVE-2024-34580 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Apache XML Security for C++ through 2.0.4 implements the XML SignatureSyntax and Processing (XMLDsig) specification without protection against anSSRF payload in a KeyInfo element. NOTE: the project disputes this CVERecord on the grounds that any vulnerabilities are the result of a failureto configure XML Security for C++ securely. Even when avoiding thisparticular issue, any use of this library would need considerableadditional code and a deep understanding of the standards and protocolsinvolved to arrive at a secure implementation for any particular use case.We recommend against continued direct use of this library.

criterions.comment: xml-security-c package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
